title: China says 32 Chinese nationals killed in North Korea bus accident
text:
China says 32 Chinese nationals killed in North Korea bus accident   00:23 
A bus carrying Chinese tourists to North Korea has been involved in a major accident resulting in the death of 36 people, including 32 Chinese nationals, according to Beijing officials. No reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A bus carrying Chinese tourists to North Korea has been involved in a major accident resulting in the death of 36 people, including 32 Chinese nationals, according to Beijing officials.
